Rock music is loved all across the globe. It is a popular genre of music. By being incredibly entertaining, rock music has found its way into the hearts of many individuals, influencing their lives in one way or another. Rock music is able to tell a story, as well as describe and express nature of humanity. Probably, we have all heard of a rock song that has expressed our feelings, emotions or even our situation. Certainly while in our different stages of life.

At the heart of rock music are rock bands. These are the artists who come up with compelling lyrics, rhythm and flow of rock music. Thanks to their skills, passion, talent and experience, they are able to reward us with songs that we sing over and over again. Songs that make us laugh or even cry. Songs that motivate us, challenge us and somehow impact our character. There are very many rock bands, and more are coming up. It is no doubt that we ought to appreciate talent in these rock bands. One way of doing so, is by getting to know the people who constitute a particular rock band.

Rock Band App for android is here to appreciate rock bands. It is a listing of rock bands. In addition, you can learn about the individuals in a particular rock band, their songs, history and success. You can also take a quiz, to test yourself, whether you really know your favorite band.

3 Doors Down is an American rock band. It was formed in 1996 from Escatwapa, Mississipi. The band became internationally famous after releasing their first single, \"Kryptonyte\". The band first album was named, \"The Better Life\", which was released in 2000. The band members at the beginning were Brad Arnold, Todd Harrell, Matt Roberts and Chris Henderson. The group was later joined by Richard Lilies. It was during a trip to Foley, Alabama, that they came up with their band official name. Since then the band has undergone changes, with some members leaving and others joining. By 2005, the band had sold over 12 million albums.

The band first studio album, \"The Better Life\", was released on February 8, 2000. It went on to become the 11th best-selling of the year, selling over 3 million copies. Some of the hits that gained international fame were \"Kryptonite\", \"Loser\" and \"Duck and Run\". A fourth single, \"Be Like That\" was re-recorded for the 2001 film American Pie 2. Their second album was released on November 12, 2002 and went platinum within two months of release. The album also produced two hit singles, \"When I am Gone\" and \"Here Without You\". The album sold 4 million copies worldwide. By 2005, the band had sold 12 million albums. The band has had great success in all their albums, most of which have been certified platinum.

You\'ve done well to learn about rock music and rock bands. I hope you have enjoyed learning, and you have learnt a thing or two about a favorite rock band. Getting to know the people behind the creation of awesome rock music is one way of appreciating their work. In most cases, rock music listeners only know the lead singer of the band. Or perhaps it is what most people identify in a band. However, there is a drummer and often a guitarist. We ought to recognize them and their input in the creative process of coming up with amazing rock hits we so love. Therefore, be sure to continue learning about rock bands, and support their works by listening and sharing their music.

This Android Native is a simple project for Google Africa Scholarship 2018, Udacity Nanodegree for Android Basics. Given the project requirements, the aim is to create an educational android quiz app. The project must use radio buttons, checkboxes and edit text as well as compute scores. I have done something a bit different. The App uses intents to change activities and improvised hard coded algorithms to achieve the desired outcome. While going through the code, keep in mind am learning. So, I have not yet covered most of the resources available in Android. For instance, I have used raw code to create a list, instead of using resources like Recycler View.

I am Leonard. Currently learning Android. I love designing an App UI/UX from scratch using my imagination, then translating it into code. Am yet to master Android animations. Otherwise, I would have implemented various animations in the app UI to handle page transitions. As you can guess, am a rock music enthusiast. Lastly, you can find the documentations of this simple App on my Github @LeonarMuia . Thank you.

5 Seconds of Summers (5SOS) is an Australian pop rock band from Sydney, New South Wales. The band was formed in 2011. They are one of the bands that came on to the spotlight thanks to YouTube. They started of posting songs of themselves and doing covers of songs by other popular artists like Chris Brown and Mike Posner, during 2011 and early 2012. The band\'s type of music is influenced by bands like McFly, Blink-182, All Time Low, Mayday Parade, Green Day, My Chemical Romance and Boys Like Girls. The band on January 2014 announced they would be setting up their own label dubbed, Hi or Hey Records.

The band rose into international fame after their tour with One Direction called, \"Take Me Home\". Their first music release, an EP entitled \"Unplugged\", reached number 3 on the iTunes chart in Australia and top 20 in both New Zealand and Sweden. The band released their first single, \"Out of My Limits\", on November 19 2012 whose YouTube video received over 100,000 views within the first 24 hours. The band also release their second single, \"Don\'t Stop\". It debuted at number 2 on the UK Singles Chart. It peaked at number one in 4 countries and was in the top 10 of 8 countries overall. They also released a self-titled album which won \"Kerrang Award\". The album debuted on the top of the Billboard 200 Chart, peaked at number one in 13 countries, and peaked in the top 10 in 26 countries. The band latest album is called \"Youngblood\", which was release on February 2018. The album debuted at number one in Australia and the US Billboard 200. It debuted number 3 in UK and seven other countries. Overall, the album reached the top 10 of 20 countries.

AC/DC is an Australian rock band formed in Sydney, in 1973. It was founded by brothers Malcolm and Angus Young who are Scottish by migrated to Australia. Their music has been described as hard rock, blues rock and controversially heavy metal. The band underwent various membership changes before the release of their first album, \"High Voltage\" in 1975. The band has sold over 200 million albums, including 71.5 million albums in the United States. The brothers decided to form a band when their sister, Margaret Young, saw the initials \"AC/DC\" on a sewing machine. It is an abbreviation of alternative current and direct current electricity. The brothers felt that the name symbolized the band\'s raw energy, power-driven performances of their music. Since the band inception, there has been tremendous change in their constitution. But the band was essentially a brain child of the two brothers.
